response.original_title: Rise Against: Generation Lost - How We Survive
response.overview: DVD includes exclusive never-before-seen band documentary plus live in-concert performance shot in May 2006 at LA's legendary Troubadour. DVD MENU INCLUDES: * "How We Survive" - An exclusive never before seen documentary piece. It is a captivating look at this true punk rock band, their start, their scene as well as an insight into their family, friends & fans. * "Burn Hollywood Burn" Live performances taped at the legendary Troubadour in Los Angeles during the band's sold out 5-night stand May 2006. * Featuring: "Injection", "Like An Angel", "Black Masks And Gasoline" and "Paper Wings" * Making Of The Video clips for "Ready To Fall" and "Swing Life Away". * Band videos: "Give It All", "Swing Life Away," "Ready To Fall" and "Prayer Of The Refugee".
response.title: Rise Against: Generation Lost - How We Survive
